foreignData.name: Kontrollzauber
foreignData.text: Übernimm die Herrschaft über die verzauberte Kreatur.

mainBoard.name: Control Magic
mainBoard.originalText: You control target creature until enchantment is discarded or game ends. If target creature is already tapped it stays tapped until you can untap it. If destroyed, target creature is put in its owner's graveyard.

rulings.text: Gaining control of a creature doesn't cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

foreignData.name: Kraftsog
foreignData.text: Dein Gegner muß alles Mana aus seinem verfügbaren Ländern produzieren. Dieses Mana und alles Mana, das er in seinem Manavorrat hat, fließt nun in Deinen Manavorrat.

mainBoard.name: Drain Power
mainBoard.originalText: Opponent must draw all mana from his or her available lands; this mana and all mana in opponent's mana pool drains into your mana pool. You can't take less than all your opponent's mana.

rulings.text: If a land can draw a variable amount of mana, the target player (not the player of this spell) chooses how much to draw.

This card forces the target player to draw mana from lands if they are untapped, but that player can choose how to draw the mana if a land they control has multiple mana abilities, or mana abilities with choices.
Your opponent may use instants and abilities of permanents in response to this spell before you get the mana.
A mana ability is an ability that (1) isn't a loyalty ability, (2) doesn't target, and (3) could add mana when it resolves.

mainBoard.text: Target player activates a mana ability of each land they control. Then that player loses all unspent mana and you add the mana lost this way.

mainBoard.name: Energy Flux
mainBoard.originalText: All artifacts in play now require an upkeep cost of {2} in addition to any other upkeep costs they may have. If the upkeep cost for an artifact is not paid, the artifact must be discarded.
mainBoard.text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

mainBoard.flavorText: "That phantom prow split the storm as lightning cast its long shadow on the battlefield below." —Mireille Gaetane, *The Valeriad*
mainBoard.name: Ghost Ship
Giant Tortoise
mainBoard.text: This creature gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Island
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {U} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.flavorText: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti Djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.
mainBoard.name: Mahamoti Djinn
mainBoard.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

foreignData.name: Manamangel
foreignData.text: Alle Gelände des Gegners werden getappt und sein Manavorrat geleert.

mainBoard.name: Mana Short
mainBoard.originalText: All opponent's lands are tapped, and opponent's mana pool is emptied. Opponent takes no damage from unspent mana.

rulings.text: If you play Mana Short in response to a spell, it will have no effect on that spell since the mana has already been paid.
It even taps lands that do not produce mana.

Since this is an instant, your opponent may use instants in response to the casting of this spell. Note that such spells and abilities will be resolved before mana is removed by Mana Short. This makes it useless as a countermeasure for spells. To use it effectively, you need to use it during Upkeep and even then it will not prevent the use of instant spells and abilities.

mainBoard.text: Tap all lands target player controls and that player loses all unspent mana.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"While, like a ghastly rapid river,
Through the pale door,
A hideous throng rush out forever,
And laugh—but smile no more."
—Edgar Allan Poe, "The Haunted Palace"
mainBoard.name: Phantom Monster

foreignData.name: Kraftleck
foreignData.text: Während der Versorgungsphase des Beherrschers der verzauberten Verzauberung fügt das Kraftleck diesem 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Dieser Spieler kann 1 pro Schadenspunkt, den er vermeiden will, ausgeben, um sich vor dem Kraftleck zu schützen.

mainBoard.name: Power Leak
mainBoard.originalText: Target enchantment costs 2 extra mana during the upkeep phase of each of its controller's turns. If target enchantment's controller cannot or will not pay this extra mana, Power Leak does 1 damage to him or her for each unpaid mana.
mainBoard.text:
Enchant enchantment
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. This Aura deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.

foreignData.name: Kraftverlust
foreignData.text: Der Zielspruch wird neutralisiert, wenn dessen Urheber nicht sofort X ausgibt. Er muß alles verfügbare Mana aus seinem Manavorrat und seinen Ländern ausgeben, bis X bezahlt ist; wenn benötigt, kann er auch andere Manaquellen heranziehen.

mainBoard.name: Power Sink
mainBoard.originalText: Target spell is countered unless its caster spends X more mana. Caster of target spell must draw and spend all available mana from lands and mana pool until X is spent; he or she may also spend mana from other sources if desired. If this is not enough mana, target spell will still be countered.

rulings.text: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not “tapped for mana”. If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tapped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

mainBoard.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

foreignData.name: Seelengift
foreignData.text: Wenn das verzauberte Land getappt wird, fügt das Seelengift dessen Beherrscher 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Psychic Venom
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever target land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom does 2 damage to target land's controller.

rulings.text: Whenever the land is tapped for any reason, the ability triggers.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, this Aura deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

mainBoard.name: Time Elemental
mainBoard.originalText:
{2}{U}{U}ocT: Return target permanent to owner's hand. Cannot target permanents with enchantment cards played on them.
If Time Elemental blocks or attacks it is destroyed and does 5 damage to controller.

rulings.text: You both sacrifice it and deal the 5 damage at end of combat.
A “permanent that isn’t enchanted” is a permanent with no Auras on it.
If Time Elemental attacks or blocks, but you no longer control it at end of combat, you can’t sacrifice it. However, it will still deal 5 damage to you.

mainBoard.text:
When this creature attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.name: Twiddle
mainBoard.originalText: Caster may tap or untap any one land, creature, or artifact in play. No effects are generated by the target card.

rulings.text: The decision whether or not to tap or untap is made on resolution. This is not a modal spell.
This is not a toggle effect. If you use Twiddle to tap a card and before it takes effect your opponent taps it, Twiddle will not automatically untap the card.

mainBoard.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

foreignData.name: Lebenszeichen
foreignData.text: Für jeden Wald Deines Gegners, der getappt wird, erhältst Du 1 Lebenspunkt.

sideBoard.name: Lifetap
sideBoard.originalText: You gain 1 life each time any forest of opponent's becomes tapped.

rulings.text: Gives one life for each and every Forest tapped.
In multi-player games it affects all opponents.

sideBoard.text: Whenever a Forest an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

foreignData.name: Vulkanausbruch
foreignData.text: Zerstöre X Gebirge Deiner Wahl. Der Vulkanausbruch fügt jedem Spieler und jeder Kreatur für jedes so vernichtete Gebirge einen Schadenspunkt zu.

sideBoard.name: Volcanic Eruption
sideBoard.originalText: Destroys X mountains of your choice, and does 1 damage to each player and each creature in play for each mountain destroyed.

rulings.text: Can be used with X equal to zero. This is useful if no Mountains are on the battlefield.

sideBoard.text: Destroy X target Mountains. Volcanic Eruption deals damage to each creature and each player equal to the number of Mountains put into a graveyard this way.
